SnS.TriggerActions.RemoveMateoRomanticFl.Condition: PLAYER_HAS_MAIL Current MateoRomanticFlag, !PLAYER_NPC_RELATIONSHIP Current Mateo Dating Engaged Married, PLAYER_HAS_SEEN_EVENT Current SnS.Ch1.Mateo.15

SnS.TriggerActions.RemoveHectorRomanticF.Condition: PLAYER_HAS_MAIL Current HectorRomanticFlag, !PLAYER_NPC_RELATIONSHIP Current Hector Dating Engaged Married

SnS.TriggerActions.RemoveCirrusRomanticF.Condition: PLAYER_HAS_MAIL Current CirrusRomanticFlag, !PLAYER_NPC_RELATIONSHIP Current Cirrus Dating Engaged Married

Player Pronoun Identifier.Description: Would usually be "is" or "are", depending on context. Example: She IS so cool! VS. They ARE so cool!

CustomMateoSoren.Description: Turns on male toddler sprites that look like Mateo.

CustomMateoDinah.Description: Turns on female toddler sprites that look like Mateo.

CustomCirrusFreddie.Description: Turns on male toddler sprites that look like Cirrus.

CustomCirrusBrittany.Description: Turns on female toddler sprites that look like Cirrus.

MermaidPendantEarring.Description: Adds the Mermaid Pendant earring for Mateo when married.

MermaidPendantHairclip.Description: Adds the Mermaid Pendant hairclip for Hector when married.

MermaidPendantChoker.Description: Adds the Mermaid Pendant choker for Cirrus when married.

MateoSpouseRoomConfig.Description: Adds a spouse room when married.

MateoSpousePatioConfig.Description: Adds a spouse patio when married.

HectorSpouseRoomConfig.Description: Adds a spouse room when married.

HectorSpousePatioConfig.Description: Adds a spouse patio when married.

CirrusSpouseRoomConfig.Description: Adds a spouse room when married.

CirrusSpousePatioConfig.Description: Adds a spouse patio when married.

EquipmentMenuConfig.Description: Recolors the Equipment Menu added by Spacecore to match Bog's Forest UI, DaisyNiko's Earthy UI, Enteis' Natural Dark Wood UI, Nom0ri's Vintage UI V2 for 1.6, Shinchan's Purple UI, SQBR's StarryBlue UI, or TheFrenchDodo's Sakura Interface Redux.

TimegateConfig.Description: Control the pacing of events by configuring how much time passes between each one.

MateoThemeConfig.Description: Toggles between a new variant of Mateo's theme (TheFrenchDodo) and the original variant (HarvzBack).

HectorThemeConfig.Description: Toggles between a new variant of Hector's theme (TheFrenchDodo) and the original variant (HarvzBack).

SkipIntroQuest_Setting.Description: Removes the quest requirements for Hector's intro quest, in case of bugs, participation in the Joja route, or other issues.

SeasonalOutfits.Description: Choose how many outfits S&S NPCs wear in-game. Full means they will have multiple outfits per season, along with unique festival outfits (if they're avaliable!). Lite means they wear a different outfit per season, plus Spirit's Eve and Flower Dance. Vanilla means they wear the same outfit for all of spring + summer + fall, a different outfit for winter, and unique outfits for Spirit's Eve and Flower Dance. Default is full.

DumpsterWarp.Description: May cause some pathing issues, but offers a shortcut to the Druid Tower.

LionsManeExtraDoorWarp.Description: May cause some pathing issues, but offers a second door to the Lion's Mane.

DatingLength.Description: Set length the player has to have dated Mateo, Hector, or Cirrus prior to any of them accepting the mermaid pendant and triggering the next romance event.

AncientSweetTeaDifficulty.Description: Set how many Ancient Sweet Tea Leaves are required to craft the universally loved Ancient Sweet Tea recipe.

ChocoboValleyMaterials.Description: Toggle the use of Chocobo Valley's materials in a Special Order from Dandelion.

RSVMaterials.Description: Toggle the use of Ridgeside Village's materials in a Special Order from Roslin.

Eli&DylanExtras.Description: Adds additional content for Eli and Dylan if they're installed.

Juliet&JessieExtras.Description: Adds additional content for Juliet and Jessie if they're installed.

ProfanityFilter.Description: When toggled 'true', profanity in this mod will be much milder, but not nonexistent.

ExcludeFromPerfection.Description: Excludes S&S items from Perfection tracking.

CasterType.AllowValues: Witch, Wizard, Sorcerer, Sorceress, Magician, Warlock, Magus, Occultist, Spellbinder, Thaumaturgist, Druid, Alchemist, Alchahestrist, Bard
CasterType.Description: Changes what kind of caster The Farmer is referred to as.

BookTextures.Description: Changes the textures of S&S Skill Books.

HandbookColorScheme.Description: Changes the the color scheme of the 'Player's Handbook' furniture item.

MateoTrollHeritage.Description: Gives Mateo horns and unique eye color based on their parentage.

MateoTail.Description:
Gives Mateo a tail.

"Mateo Troll Heritage" must be set to true for this to take effect.

CirrusRainbowHair.AllowValues: RealisticRandom, DailyRandom, Brown, Red, Orange, Yellow, Blue
CirrusRainbowHair.Description:
Gives Cirrus a variety of dyed hair colors, or optionally choose a static one.
RealisticRandom gives a delay between hair color changes

CirrusRainbowEyes.AllowValues: DailyRandom, Purple, Blue, Brown, Gray, Green
CirrusRainbowEyes.Description: Gives Cirrus a variety of colored contacts, or optionally choose a static one.

CirrusSmokeyEye.Description: Always give Cirrus Smokey eyeshadow when she wears makeup.
